title: How to Command Angels
description: The Angels of God are around us to encourage and protect us all the time. We have the ability to pray and put the Angels to work on our behalf.  Jacob Kodesh gives an in-depth biblical look into how we can deal with Angels in an easy to read format. Jacob gives many personal testimonies and experiences he has had with Angels throughout his life.http://www.amazon.com/dp/B00DU5SCFW
author: Jacob Kodesh
